settings.find_text:
Attach your NutTag to everyday items and use the app to locate them in seconds by sound or map.
Separation alert will notify you if ever you leave your items or phone behind.

Separation alert notifies you before
you leave items behind.
settings.block_2_heading: Find your stuff by sound or map
settings.block_2_text: View the last known location on the map, make your items ring if close but out of sight.
settings.block_3_text: Press the NutTag button twice to make your phone ring, even if it’s on silent!
settings.block_4_text: With an inteligent learning chip the NutTag uses 30% less power daily.

settings.seek_text:
Protect your valuables and loved ones by keeping track of their real-time location via your app.
Set a safety region on your app to enable geo-fence & alerts. Perfect for children, pets, vehicles - anything.
settings.left_block_1_text: Nut Technologies pioneer in battery saving algorithms with up to 28 days standby.
settings.left_block_2_text: See details about where your GPS has been with 28 days of historical footprints.
settings.right_block_1_text: Knowing where your items are at all times offers the highest level of security.
settings.right_block_2_text: Set a safety radius and be notified if this area has been entered or breached.

settings.slide_text: Separation alert notifies you before you leave any items behind. Your app will also show you the last known location on the map.
A community with millions of active users world-wide to help you find your lost items.

settings.block_heading: Find your stuff by sound or map
settings.block_text: See your items on a map or make them ring when out of sight.
Use your NutTAG to make your phone ring, even if it’s on silent!

Use the indicator to gauge distance and ring items when close by.
Millions of active users to help you locate your lost items.

settings.heading: What else can it do?
settings.sub_text: The all-in-one tracking device to protect your every-day items. New features updated monthly*
settings.grey_text: We are super proud of our trackers, see news feed to learn more about why we are leading the pack.

settings.slide_title: Track your luggage on and off the plane
settings.slide_text: Attach a NutTAG to your luggage and passport to be notified that your items are in range when on and off the plane. The Lost & Found community is especially helpful in busy airports.

settings.slide_title: For the things that run away
settings.slide_text: Separation alert will notify you if your pet goes out of range. You can also expand your search using all app's in the ‘Lost & Found’ network.
Latest app features include 'Find my Friends'. Now you can add friends & family to view each-others current location and their historical footprints.

settings.heading: A global lost & found community
settings.sub_heading: with millions of users to help you find lost items
settings.foot_lead: Having a NutTag on your valuables gives you 100% more chance of finding them.
settings.foot_left_html:
Is your stuff on the run? The Lost & Found Network will help you locate your items anywhere in the world. When another NutTag user comes within range of your lost item, you will be instantly notified of it's new location.

This feature is completely private and discrete, so only you will know that your item is lost.
settings.foot_right_html: High transit zones like airports, shopping centres and schools are the most common places to lose your items, they are also the easiest places to find them again due to the high volume of traffic and active users.

settings.heading: Nothing is lost! Most vibrant
settings.custom_text: Learn more about - NutTag Find v3

settings.heading: Awesome custom solutions
settings.sub_text: create buzz with promotional items that work.

settings.list_text:

  • Free Shipping Aus Wide
  • 30 Day Money Back
  • 1 Yr Warranty (Aus & NZ)
Notice to Australian Purchasers: Product specifications are engineered and optimised for our Aus & NZ market. The Lost & Found feature is designed for Aus & NZ network.
Genuine Product Warranties and returns apply to goods purchased through NutTag direct only. NutTag AU is the only source for Nut Technology products.

settings.heading: Purchase policy
settings.sub_text: Warranty, Support and Guarantee

settings.featured_parallax_text: Ensure you do so immediately on receipt of your NutTag

settings.text: Nut Technologies Is proud to announce an alliance with Lenovo. Since 2015 Lenovo has been the worlds largest IT company for design and manufacturing personal computers and tablets. They are now also the Largest vendor of smart phones in Asia Pacific, after aquiring Motorola company from Google in 2014.

settings.heading: Whats in the box!
settings.sub_text: Each pack type comes in a single foam core box containing up to four tags

settings.block_text: The alarm sounds on both phone and NutTag when separated.
The app records the last Time and Place you had your items and guides you to their location.
Ring lost items from your phone. NutTag will play a loud tune until you find it.
Use any one of your Tag's to make your phone ring-even on silent.

settings.heading: Features
settings.sub_text: Everyday tracking & Anti loss features include

settings.block_text: If the NutTag is out of the safety range, your phone app will notify you.
Set the Silent Region to disable phone and NutTag alerts within selected zone without sound.
When the phone is left behind and out of safety range, NutTag and your phone will each beep to notify you.
Set Interim Silent Mode to disable alerts from your phone and NutTag within selected times. Great for the work place!
Call your NutTag by pressing the button on the app, NutTag will then beep so you can find it.
You can set as many Silent Periods as required this will disable alerts from both NutTag and phone within the Silent Period. Great for home and work!
Nut App will show you the location where and when NutTag was disconnected on the map.
Use anti-loss mode for items which you need to take with you each day.
Use find-it mode for items which are difficult to find and need others to join the search.
If the paired NutTag needs to be found by others, tap the "share" button to activate group control.
Your app will notify you if the battery is running low so you will never be caught out.
Trace friends' historical footprint up to 4 weeks into the past and see their history of foot steps on the Map.
Add your friends and family within app and see their location in real-time.

Declare your NutTags lost and millions of active apps will search for your lost item. When your item is found, you will be notified of the location of where it has been found. All steps are executed using 128 bit encryption and total privacy. Item lo-cation updates are only shared with the NutTag owner.

Android:
Devices with Bluetooth 4, version 4.3 +
(Not 8.0 & 8.1)
Samsung Galaxy s3 / Note3 - 4
Huawei Mate2 / P7 / Honor 6
LG Nexus / HTC One / Mi: Note
Lenovo Z2 Pro Meizu Note2

Apple IOS :
Compatible with iOS 7 +
iPhone 4 +
iPod Touch 5th Gen,
iPad 3rd Gen or newer.

Our trackers communicate with your phone via Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). We use the most advanced European chip set, including proprietary battery longevity algorithms. With normal use our tags will last up to 12 months.

FREE regular shipping applies within Aus only. All FREE Delivery orders can take from 5-20 days to arrive. Express delivery 2-6 days. All Super Express deliveries are dispatched from our Melbourne Warehouse. We are proud Australia Post partners.

We respect your privacy. All personal information is kept confidential, and will never be shared with a third party. Note that we may use location information sourced from your phone for the purposes of our Lost & Found Network; however this data will be anonymised before being sent to the searching party.

We know you will love your product, if for any reason you feel it is not what you require you can speak with a customer service agent. Within 30 days you may return your product, refund will be complete providing return authorisation criteria is observed. Please view full returns policy for further information.

We offer 7 day local support, operated from our Melbourne office. With NutTag and phone experts available via live chat and email, we’ll help you solve any issues you encounter in setting up your tag. Contact us via live chat on our website, or send us and email to support(at)nuttag.com.au
We offer a one year warranty – should there be any issue with your NutTag, simply contact us at support(at)nuttag.com.au and we will help you out.
There are no additional costs associated with our Bluetooth trackers. The accompanying Nut app is free to use, and is regularly updated with new features.
Bluetooth 4 offers an open-air range of up to 50 meters. Walls and other obstacles reduce the signal propagation. Average indoor range is 10-30 meters.

settings.about_text: We're a passionate team dedicated to developing tracking technology products that help improve people's lives. While keeping track of al the things which keep your life moving can be stressful, we feel it doesn't have to be. We believe you can live stress free, save time and money and feel empowered along the way.

settings.heading: Who are we?
settings.text: Since 2013 we have designed wearable sensors and wireless technology that is highly intelligent and constantly learning ways to help us. We have embarked on a journey to create a wearable product that can engage with its users to provide global security for anything. We design products that fit seamlessly into your life so you can focus on the things that matter.

settings.heading: Est. 2013

Customisation of each element is limited only only to the imagination. Our designers will guide you, to create a successful solution within your budget.

settings.sub_text:
A fundamental part of a positive user experience is to serve a healthy smattering of local support (7 days a week) to an audience naturally requiring guidance on integrating great new technology into their lifestyle.

To stay abreast your NutTAG will ask you politely to be brought near to your app for necessary firmware updates. We are here to help, with extended warranty and round the clock support to ensure your corporate gift never depreciates.

settings.block_text:
One stress has been removed from the morning rush, thanks to Nut. Every morning is a rush, getting the kids up, fed and dressed takes a lot of effort. The one thing that frustrates me the most is once I have got them all ready and I can’t find the car keys.

Ever since I started using Nut Find on my keys, this is a problem of the past. I can find my keys anywhere in the house within seconds thanks to the on-board speaker. All it takes is one touch on the app. Nut helps keep my morning in order. Now I can focus on the important things, instead of where my keys are. Story from Louise in Melbourne, Australia

settings.heading: "The Most Advanced Tracking Technology"
settings.html_content_mobile: NutTag's patent European chip harnesses a learning algorithm which adapts to your environment and usage. The easy to use smart phone application updates the NutTag monthly with learned software and security features. This adaptable and uniquely scalable engineering is a breakthrough for wearable technology in 2016.
settings.html_content_desktop:
NutTag's patent European chip harnesses a learning algorithm which adapts to your environment and usage. The easy to use smart phone application updates the NutTag monthly with learned software and security features. This adaptable and uniquely scalable engineering is a breakthrough for wearable technology in 2016.

Further exclusive NutTag technology and advanced functionality include; Geo-Fence feature, Real-time GPS tracking for friends, four weeks historical GPS footprints, one year battery life (and learning!), huge 50 meter range, separation alert on phone app and tracker; ensures you never lose your phone or your keys with just one NutTag.

settings.sub_text: <font color="white">I never leave my wallet behind!</font>

settings.block_text:
I am a really forgetful person, and I used to keep forgetting where I put my keys, wallet and mobile phone. When I first saw the Nut Trackers, I knew they were exactly what I needed to help me keep track of my things – And I couldn’t have been more right.

There have been many times that Nut has made my life easier, but I’m going to share the one that impressed me most.

I had been in Sydney on business for the day, and was at the airport waiting for the flight back home. It was 30 minutes to boarding, and I was preparing to go to the flight gate. It was at this moment that I realised that my wallet was not in my pocket. I was in shock, suddenly thinking back over the places I had visited throughout the day, wondering where it could be.

Then I remembered that I had placed a Nut Tracker in my wallet, and I was immediately relieved. All I had to do was check the app for the last known location of my wallet. When I open the app I find that I the last place I had my wallet was 20 minutes ago in the car park. I hastily made my way back to this location, and was overjoyed to see it was sitting on the ground, right where it fell out of my pocket.

I made my way back to the gate, and boarded the plane in peace, knowing that I had narrowly avoided a disaster. All thanks to my trusty Nut Tracker. Thank you Nut!

settings.header_tracking_label: What do you need to track?

settings.feature_heading: Meet the world’s smallest & lightest live GPS Tracker
settings.feature_html:
Small and powerful, NutTAG™ SEEK GPS is a user-friendly and simple solution for real-time positioning so you can keep track of your kids, pets, motor vehicles, luggage – or anything that moves, via the Online Portal and mobile App.

Set a safety region on your app to enable geo-fence alerts, access up to 4 weeks of historical footprints, emergency SOS button and up to 28 days rechargeable battery life.

Accessories Available: Vehicle AUX Power + Pets Collar + Lanyard

settings.block_text: Receive alerts whenever SEEK PRO GPS in proximity of your custom safe or danger zones.
With up to 28 days standby time, the information you need is always reliably available.
For emergency situations activate the on-board SOS button to receive instant alerts through your connected App.
Access up to 40 days of location history.
Be notified if a potential fall or collision has taken place. Fast alerts allow you to react promptly.
Listen-in is a silent call to the tracker to perform an audible check-in to the tracker.
Low battery, fall / collision, Geo-fence, SOS
Set a no Motion Alarms to trigger whenever your unit sits still longer than defined limit, or a Movement Alarm whenever the tracker moves.
Speak direct over your tracker just like a mobile phone. *Extra cost to enable
Activate power saving modes, to conserve battery. Extent battery life from up to 2-16days.
Optimised low energy GPRS ensures safety.
IPX5 Standard (Spill Resistant)

In app push notifications, Email and SMS.
*Extra cost to enable SMS alerts.
Your SEEK GPS unit uses multiple positioning technologies to get you the most accurate location 2-5m.
Activate global roaming and use your GPS overseas. (contact support for further infomation)

settings.heading: What else can it do?
settings.sub_text: SEEK GPS tracker is one of the most advanced trackers available, with many custom features it will suite your needs.

Our kids walk down a major road to get to their primary school. It always makes me nervous seeing them off in the morning, I can't wait to get one of these and put it in their school bags, love it.
Sally W

The kids are at that age where they will explore their boundaries, we have had some scary moments not knowing where they went after school and they are too young to carry a phone, SEEK GPS is perfect for myself and my husband to view their location...and history!
- Jenny G

We travel a lot, great to monitor the kids, luggage and dog when required. Its so simple yet relieving!

Our girls are in high school now and using public transport to travel in and out of the city each day, SEEK GPS was purchased to assist with their safety, especially when they stay back late for sport. The SOS button is their direct connection with us which they have never used but feel safe in the knowledge that they can.

settings.heading: Unit Specifications
settings.right_block_text_2:
Locate mode 28day
Deep sleep mode, Standby
settings.right_block_text_2_2:
Regular use 2-15 days
Based on power saving modes

settings.block_text: Android: Android 4.0 +
Apple IOS: Apple iOS 7 +

settings.block_title: How long does the battery last?
settings.block_text: SEEK GPS unit is highly intelligent and has many power saving modes which can extend the battery life up to 28 days.

settings.block_title: How long does it take to charge the battery?
settings.block_text: The SEEK GPS unit will take between 2-3 hours to fully recharge.
Yes you can however you will need to activate global roaming at an additional charge of $1 per day. Please contact LiveChat or support@nuttag.com.au for assistance in getting ready for your travels.

Our SIM cards are embedded in the GPS with 12 months subscriptions – so they are ready for use out of the box. There are no contracts, so you can let the subscription expire and not renew, if you choose. Note the basic subscription doesn't include SMS credit.
GPS is used for real-time or live tracking, see location activity and manage your GPS features via the easy to use Mobile App and Web Portal.
Our SEEK GPS technology can be within 2-5m of accuracy.

A Geo-Fence or Safety Zone is a pre-defined perimeter around a location which you can draw on the map. A virtual fence. If your GPS exits or enters this area, a notification will be sent to the App & Web Portal.
You will receive push notifications via the App & Web Portal.

settings.block_title: Why does it need a SIM card?
settings.block_text: The GPS unit will send its reporting information data via the 3G network to the cloud. The unit also has SMS and two way communication ability.

settings.block_title: What is included in the subscription?
settings.block_text: A subscription includes SIM, 12 months of national SIM Data, Support, Portal and App access.

settings.block_title: What’s the difference between Bluetooth and GPS?
settings.block_text: GPS devices use a global positioning system, being Satelites to determine its location. The SEEK GPS sends this location information and other alerts data via the Cell Network (Telstra / Vodafone) to the cloud to be read through your App and Online Portal. Bluetooth is a short range connectivity technology which operates up to 60 meters, great for keeping track of Keys, Wallets, and items you keep near to you.

settings.block_title: Do I pay extra for SMS?
settings.block_text: Yes, this is not included in your plan, alerts (eg. low battery, geo-fence, falls, SOS etc.) can be sent via SMS to your desired number at 22 cents per message for local and 75 cents per SMS for international *in addition to the subscription plan.

settings.block_title: Why are there multiple SIM options?
settings.block_text: SIM providers have differing coverage areas nationally and Internationally. Telstra has the best coverage Within Australia & NZ and operates well in the USA. Vodafone coverage is less effective in rural areas within Australia and effective in Europe, South America and Asia.

Recommended Services – 
850MHz (Telstra) – For use in Americas
900MHz (Vodafone) – For use in Europe, Middle East, Asia and Africa
Please contact support to confirm coverage.

settings.sub_text: This is lead text

settings.faq_text: Because were the best!
this will be red.

settings.main_text:
Personal GPS Tracking
for Safety & Visibility
settings.sub_text:
Specialists in Wandering Management
Fall Detection and SOS alerts.

settings.feature_heading: Meet the world’s smallest & lightest live GPS Tracker
settings.feature_html:
Small and powerful, NutTAG™ SEEK GPS is a user-friendly and simple solution for real-time positioning so you can keep track of your loved ones via the Online Portal and mobile App.

Popular features for Aged Care include geo-fence alerts, to be alerted when your tracker leaves their safe zone. With early onset features such as Emergency SOS button and Fall detection are highly effective with up to 15 days rechargeable battery life.*

Accessories available for Aged Care: Pouch pack, Velcro Band, Lanyard.

settings.faq_heading: Are products available on NDIS subsidy?
settings.faq_text: Yes, we are partnered with NDIS, Yoralla, Independent Living Centre.

Battery life can vary based on your requirement for reporting, this means you can ask the unit to update on on location every 10 seconds or daily, the battery life can last up to 15 days dependant on your requirement.

The unit is $199, you will then require a subscription. We offer Vodafone ($95 per annum) which is typically fine inner city and Telstra ($185 per annum) which is best for outside metro areas, having less coverage. You can find which will work best in your area by searching your post code in the coverage map.

settings.faq_heading: How will I receive notification & alerts?
settings.faq_text: Notifications and Alerts are sent directly to your App and Online Portal. You can also request for these to be sent via SMS however for this featre you will require an SMS pack. You can purchase this within the accessories on the purchase page.
The unit is made to withstand water sprays like shower time. However it will not like to be submerged for a long period.

settings.faq_heading: Does it have Fall Detection & SOS?

settings.feature_html:
Small and powerful, NutTAG™ SEEK GPS is a user-friendly and simple solution for real-time positioning so you can keep track of your loved ones via the Online Portal and mobile App.

Popular features for tracking your children include geo-fence alerts, to be alerted when your tracker leaves the safe zone. Emergency SOS button, call the device and listen-in or speak two-way. Up to 15 days rechargeable battery life.*

settings.faq_text:
GPS is used for real-time or live tracking, see location activity and manage your GPS features via the easy to use Mobile App or Web Portal.

The majority of GPS units available on the international market are made for use on 2G cell service. In 2017 Australia has forced the upgrade of all cell active services to 3G / 4G. Our GPS products are fully certified to meet Australian & International standards – ask about using SEEK GPS whilst travelling.

The unit is $199, you will then require a subscription. We offer Vodafone ($95 per annum) which is typically fine inner city and Telstra ($185 per annum) which is best for outside metro areas, having less coverage. You can find which will work best in your area by searching your post code in the coverage map.

We offer two bands within our GPS (900MHz and 850MHz) each are suitable for different countries, let out team know where you plan to travel and they will assist you in selecting the correct device. International roaming can be activated for $1 per day, ask us to get you setup - support@nuttag.com.au

Our SIM cards are embedded in our device and charged with 12 months of data – so they are ready for use out of the box. There are no contracts, so you can let the data expire and not renew if you choose.

settings.faq_heading: How will I receive notifications & alerts?

settings.faq_heading: How long does the battery last?
settings.faq_text: Battery levels are dependant on your individual settings. The most effective settings which can gain 5-14 days is  accelerometer activation (place the unit into deep sleep mode when not moving) and extend your reporting interval from seconds to multiple times per day.
The GPS unit is designed with an IP rating of 67, this allows for streams of water like hosing your pet will be fine, however the unit will not like to be submerged in water.

settings.sub_text: Your personal luggage tracker, travel confidently.

settings.feature_heading: Meet the world’s smallest & lightest live GPS Tracker
settings.feature_html:
Small and powerful, NutTAG™ SEEK GPS is a simple solution for real-time tracking so you can keep track of your assets from OR to anywhere in the world.

Designed to be adaptable and versatile to suit a multitude of applications, ready to use out of the box. Create multiple accounts and share visibility of your assets with friends via the Online Portal and mobile App.

Accessories Available: Pouch bag + Lanyard

settings.faq_text:
Travelling overseas requires compatibility with numerous cell network frequencies, SEEK GPS is designed to operate on two major bands which will ensure it operates perfectly in most countries.

Speak to a member of the connections team prior to travel to ensure your global roaming is set accurately for the countries you plan to visit.
Global roaming is charged at $1 per day, whilst you are overseas. It is the same fee for anywhere in the world.

settings.faq_heading: Is it safe to go on the plane?
settings.faq_text: Yes, the unit is perfectly OK to fly, it will loose cell network connection whilst above 5000 feet and regain location again just before the plane lands.

Battery life can vary based on your requirement for reporting, this means you can ask the unit to update on on location every 10 seconds or daily, the battery life can last up to 15 days dependant on your requirement.

Our SIM cards are embedded in our device and charged with 12 months of data – so they are ready for use out of the box. There are no contracts, so you can let the data expire and not renew if you choose.

settings.faq_heading: Can I use it to navigate in foreign countries?
settings.faq_text: Yes you certainly can, place the SEEK GPS in your hotel room and navigate back to its location from anywhere in the world.

settings.slide_title: Protect your family and luggage when travelling
settings.slide_text:
Travelling overseas requires compatibility with numerous cell network frequencies, SEEK GPS is designed to operate on two major bands which will ensure it operates perfectly in most countries.

Speak to a member of the connections team prior to travel to ensure your global roaming is set accurately for the countries you plan to visit.

Place your SEEK GPS in your luggage and be safe in the knowledge that your items will never be lost!

GPS Smart Watch

settings.heading: What's in the box?
settings.sub_text: We engineer each unit in Melbourne so it is ready for use - out of the box!

settings.block_title: How long does the battery last?
settings.block_text: Our Smart GPS watch has a 600mAH rechargeable batter which will get you 1-2 days normal use and up to 5 days on standby mode.

settings.block_title: How long does it take to charge the battery?
settings.block_text: Our Smart GPS watch will take between 2-3 hours to fully recharge.
Yes you can however you will need to activate global roaming at an additional charge of $1 per day. Please contact LiveChat or support@nuttag.com.au for assistance in getting ready for your travels.

Our SIM cards are embedded in the GPS unit with 12 months subscriptions – so they are ready for use out of the box. There are no contracts, so you can let the subscription expire and not renew, if you choose. Note the basic subscription doesn't include SMS credit.
GPS is used for real-time or live tracking, see location activity and manage your GPS features via the easy to use Mobile App and Web Portal.

Our SEEK GPS technology can be within 2-5m of accuracy.
it uses 3G + GPS + WiFi + LBS multi-mode positioning

A Geo-Fence or Safety Zone is a pre-defined perimeter around a location which you can draw on the map. A virtual fence. If your GPS exits or enters this area, a notification will be sent to the App & Web Portal.
You will receive push notifications via the App & Web Portal. You can also purchase SMS credit to receive SMS alerts.

settings.block_title: Why does it need a SIM card?
settings.block_text: The GPS unit will send its reporting information data via the 3G network to the cloud. The unit also has SMS and two way communication ability.

settings.block_title: What is included in the subscription?
settings.block_text: A subscription includes SIM, 12 months of national SIM Data, Support, Portal and App access.

settings.block_title: Do I pay extra for SMS?
settings.block_text: Yes, this is not included in your plan, alerts (eg. low battery, geo-fence, falls, SOS etc.) can be sent via SMS to your desired number at 22 cents per message for local and 75 cents per SMS for international *in addition to the subscription plan.
Recommended Services – 850MHz (Telstra) – For use in Americas 900MHz (Vodafone) – For use in Europe, Middle East, Asia and Africa Please contact support to confirm coverage.

INCLUDES - 1 year Telstra Service, App’s, Online Portal and Support.
